awards.title: Davos World Economic Forum Annual Meeting
awards.description:
Hajo had the honour to be invited for the Annual Meeting of the World Economic Forum in Davos in 2018.
The World Economic Forum Annual Meeting is the only yearly gathering that brings together leaders of global society. The heads and members of more than 100 governments, top executives of the 1,000 foremost global companies, leaders of international organizations and relevant non-governmental organizations, the most prominent cultural, societal and thought leaders, and the disruptive voices of the Forum’s Young Global Leaders, Global Shapers and Technology Pioneers come together at the beginning of each year to define priorities and shape global, industry and regional agendas.

awards.title: UN Torino Leadership Award
awards.description:
The United Nations Deputy Secretary-General, H.E. Jan Eliasson awarded the Torino Leadership Awards on the 7th of July 2014 celebrating the achievements of the Leaders in Local Innovation for Global Change 2014.
http://tlf.unssc.org/hajo-van-beijma/

awards.title: Young Global Leader 2014
awards.description: The Forum of Young Global Leaders is a unique, multistakeholder community of more than 900 exceptional young leaders.  Bold, brave, action-oriented and entrepreneurial, these individuals commit both their time and talent to make the world a better place.

certifications.name: ScaleUpBoard, the Non Executive Directors governance program for Scale-Ups

projects.title: Mentor @ Morgan Stanley Sustainable Investing Challenge
projects.description: The Morgan Stanley Sustainable Investing Challenge harnesses the power of capital markets and student creativity to create positive impact in a world of perpetual resource scarcity and continued population growth. A pitch competition for graduate students, the Morgan Stanley Sustainable Investing Challenge focuses on developing institutional-quality investment vehicles that seek positive environmental or social impact and competitive financial returns.

contributors.headline: Headhunter & VC for Tech companies & Scale-ups🎯

projects.title: Nomads, the mobile phone based information system for refugees.
projects.description:
Nomads - a Dutch Coalition for Humanitarian Innovation (DCHI) project -
Nomads will create a technology platform where refugees can access tailor-made information based on their location, interests and goals. The current refugee crisis asks for data driven, mobile phone based innovation. Nomads will deliver this with a system that has been designed by refugees and will focus on refugees.

projects.title: Lecturer at Stanford Massive Open Online Course: Mobile Health Without Borders
projects.description: The course will function like a conference, but it takes place over three months rather than two days, and encourages the transformation from passive audience observer to active participant and thought leader. The themes to be addressed are: 1) Global Health Challenges. 2) Mobile Health Opportunities. 3) Entrepreneurship in Health Care.

contributors.headline: Headhunter & VC for Tech companies & Scale-ups🎯

projects.title: Co-Founder at Sunloader (Solar/M2M/Mobile banking/Social Mesh networks)
projects.description:
Sunloader is a for-benefit organization that provides access to renewable energy to off-grid customers. It takes advantage of the revolutions in mobile telephony, M2M, mobile banking and 3D printing to create a modular, mobile, microsolar mesh-network.
Co-Founded in November 2012 by Paul Falzone, Gunter Wehmeyer and Hajo van Beijma during a challenge project at THNK. Currently in phase of business plan modelling and prototype testing.

projects.title: Three60: a radical new way for aid transparency
projects.description: Three60 is an initiative of 1%Club, Akvo and Text to Change. We collaborate to help people working in development aid use new information technologies and tools to give communities more say, bring aid work to life online, and engage a new more connected generation.

profile_positions.description:
Matching tech talent with scale-ups & tech companies in the Netherlands is what I do! Executive search, talent acquisition & recruitment for the tech industry. 

Current clients:
* Temper
* Pera
* Actuals
* InSpark
* Minkowski
* The Nu
* Edge Next
* PressPage
* Consultancy
profile_positions.title: Headhunter / Founder

profile_positions.description: EWOR VC is a blend of a fellowship program and venture capital. Investing €75K to €150K, connecting you with unicorn founders, and offering over 20 unique entrepreneurship courses.
profile_positions.title: Venture Partner Benelux

profile_positions.description: Meerkat is a Machine Learning (artificial intelligence) platform that learns from your previous successful and unsuccessful recruitment matches. Meerkat uses Deep Neural Networks to not only learn from your companies prior matches with candidates but also find soft skills in CV's and publicly available information from candidates.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
The Forum of Young Global Leaders is a unique, multi-stakeholder community of more than 900 leaders.  Bold, brave, action-oriented and entrepreneurial, these individuals commit both their time and talent to make the world a better place.
The WEF's mission is cited as "committed to improving the state of the world". It is a membership-based organization and hosts their annual meeting at the end of January in Davos
profile_positions.title: Young Global Leader 2014

profile_positions.description: Impact Circles bring together like-minded peers on various thematic areas through regular events, networking sessions, and exchanges. The Circles are intended to provide a space for regular exchange around ideas and best practices.
profile_positions.title: World Economic Forum’s Impact Circle: Artificial Intelligence (AI).

profile_positions.description: Non Executive Director for Fairchain. The FairChain methodology helps transform innovative business thinking into demand-driven theories of change. By using cutting-edge technologies, we can amplify any impact roadmap into interactive consumer experiences that resonate loudly across all channels and stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: Minkowski helps organizations to identify what's possible for them in the future (short term and long term), so they can design how to respond to the world changing around them. We are a collective of people that facilitate change for individuals and organizations world wide.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor & Shareholder

profile_positions.description: SingularityU Benelux is the Dutch license holder of Singularity University, a California USA based company founded by Google & NASA.
profile_positions.title: Moderator, Shareholder & Advisor

profile_positions.description: I helped prepare global leaders and organizations such as: Shell, Rabobank, Innogy, NS, Deloitte, PVH, Ageas, Dutch Ministry of Defense and many others for the future with transformative programs and events.
profile_positions.title: CCO & Strategic Relations

profile_positions.description: Newpeople has been a thought leader in the field of digital leadership for the past 15 years. They offer different services in executive search, interim solutions and designing digital teams. They work for organisations transitioning from ‘old to new’ and who are in different phases of the digital transformation process.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director Executive Search

profile_positions.description: The Dutch Trade & Investment Board (DTIB) is a public-private organization in the field of international business. Within the DTB the Dutch government works together with the public and private sector. The DTB Africa workgroup focuses on the relation between Dutch companies and Africa.
profile_positions.title: Member Dutch Trade & Investment Board Africa

company.name: TTC Mobile | Your key to emerging markets

profile_positions.company: TTC Mobile | Your key to emerging markets
profile_positions.description: Minority acquisition ABN AMRO 2014. The explosive growth of mobile communications in emerging markets offers amazing potential. It allows us to engage into conversation with people, previously unreachable through other communication channels. Since 2008 TTC runs mobile marketing campaigns, collects data and measures impact using mobile technology. TTC connects organizations with their hard-to-reach target groups. They create interaction with people on any scale, in a cost-effective way. Their extensive expertise comes from several years of reaching millions of people across Africa, South America and Asia.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Director
